author: Special Correspondent
text:
Labour Commissioner P. Amudha has instructed 81 petrol / diesel pumps across the State to stop supply and has initiated legal action against them for irregularities in supply of petroleum products.

The action follows complaints from consumers in 2015 that some bunks did not follow the rules of the Weights and Measures Act while supplying products.

The Commissioner ordered her subordinate officials to inspect the bunks in their respective jurisdiction. Inspections were conducted in all the 285 bunks in the State, according to a release.
title: Action initiated against 81 petrol pumps
